description:
Dec 4-5, Dec 7: Downtown West/Kerby Station (Single Tracking)

This station will NOT be fully closed, this is a partial closure. There is emergency work scheduled on the westbound track near Downtown West/Kerby Station on Thursday, December 4 from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. Work will continue on the westbound track from 10 a.m. until approximately 2 p.m. on Friday, December 5, and from 6:30 a.m. until end of service (or work is complete) on Sunday, December 7.

For travel in either direction from Downtown West/Kerby Station during this time, you will need to catch the train from the eastbound platform (the one heading into City Centre).

For more information, please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service

Dec 3-6: Sunalta Station - Elevator Outage

The elevators to the station platforms at Sunalta Station will be closed for repair work staring on Wednesday, December 3 and are scheduled to reopen by end of service on Monday, December 8.

During this time, Blue Line Shuttle buses will be available to accommodate customers from Sunalta Station to Downtown West/Kerby Station.

To learn more, please visit calgarytransit.com/elevators
